mapper.select: select * from tbl_attach where upload_path = to_char(sysdate - 1, 'yyyy\mm\dd')
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_attach(master_name, uuid, master_id, upload_path, file_name, file_type) values(#{masterName}, #{uuid}, #{masterId}, #{uploadPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileType,jdbcType=CHAR})
